description: Extract the password value from the 'readme' file by printing only the part after the colon.
Read the file named '-' in the home directory. The filename is a single dash and must be properly referenced or escaped to avoid being interpreted as a command option.
Read the file named 'spaces in this filename' in the home directory. The filename contains spaces and must be properly quoted or escaped when accessed.
Read the hidden file located inside the inhere directory. The file name starts with a dot (.), so it is hidden by default. Use shell options to list hidden files and read its contents.
